      • getType

        protected abstract java.lang.reflect.Type getType(boolean arrayListORStack)
        Used by Gson to serialize the deck. Return a Type object according to the param: ArrayList or Stack
        Parameters:
        arrayListORStack - True if you want an ArrayList, false for a Stack
        Returns:
        A Type object of the specify class, parametrized of the deck (WeaponCard, PowerupCard, AmmoCard)

      • pick

        public T pick()
        Pick the first card of the deck. If the card picked is the last one, mix the deck.
        Returns:
        The first elements of the deck

      • discard

        protected void discard(T card)
        Move the card in the discarded pile. DON'T USE WITH THOSE CARDS WHICH DOSE NOT HAVE A DISCARDED PILE
        Parameters:
        card - Card to discard

      • getCardById

        public T getCardById(int id)
        Return the card corresponding to the id
        Parameters:
        id - Card's id
        Returns:
        The card with that id, null if there's not
